sentences: Helistage meile kui sa jõuad kohale.
Ta helistas oma emale pärast tööd.
context: The word 'helistage' is the second person plural imperative form of the verb 'helista', which means 'to call by phone'. It's used when giving an instruction or request to a group of people. The infinitive form would be 'helista', and in other forms it could be 'helin' (I call), 'helid' (you call, singular), 'helistab' (he/she calls), etc.
